Name: Macka
Ingredients: 15 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare lemon slice wheel for garnish.
Review: A long fruity drink for parched palates.
History: Famously, the only cocktail, indeed the only drink, served since 1928 at the Damour Colette bar in Lamballe-Armor, Brittany, France. Each customer is only allowed two.
Nutrition: One serving of Macka contains 194 calories
